name: Thot Patrol Simulator
description:
Thot Patrol Simulator is a third-person shooter game with satirical humour set in the fictional Gamer Girl City. You take on the role of Sheriff Chad Digbick, and must patrol the deadly streets and clear the pavements from hostile Thots.

The role of Thot Patrol isn't easy, but someone has to do it.

Features:

  • Third person shooter game play
  • Multiple weapons to use
  • Several types of different enemies
  • Boss battle
  • Satirical humor
